x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: NonProfit AI seeks to provide Non profits and developmental organizations with the skills and trainings on demand to increase their capacity to serve their community.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Artificial Intelligenct, GenAI, and Agent AI are all around us. Non profits are not insulated from its impact and use. Non profits need to also have this technology skill to improve their operations and support their constituents.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

ServiceNow Now Human Resource Management and Customer Service Management with the Professional Plus with features  Now Assist capabilities. 

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Availability of high speed internet.

Availability of the devices for all participants

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Time constraints due to participant schedules.

Learning curve to setup the Train the Trainer group.

Set up Center of excellence, CoE.
